results.name: 1st Prize Help Baldi No Filename2 (Mod Dave Algebra)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 / AMD A8-7600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics with 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / RX 550 with 2GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
